translation.en: All right.

translation.en: Any chance you can take Drew with you to drop Cleo?

translation.en: -Sure, of course. -Yes!

translation.en: -You are looking good, by the way. -Thank you.

translation.en: I know it hasn't been easy, being a stay-at-home dad.
translation.it: So che non è stato facile restare a casa,

translation.en: After that, you and me on a beach in Hawaii, no kids.

translation.en: God's honest promise, I will make you the happiest man on the planet.
translation.it: E, giuro su Dio, ti renderò l'uomo più felice del pianeta.

translation.it: - Sono le 7:30, vai. - Ok, sì.

translation.en: All right.

translation.en: The Lakers traded Jason Hoodak and no one even cares.

translation.en: -Who? -[Max] See? That's what I'm talking about.
translation.it: - Chi? - Vedi? È come ti dicevo.

translation.en: Okay, Max.
translation.it: Ok, Max.

translation.en: Was that my bike?

translation.it: Merda.

translation.en: -We do not talk like that in this-- -[baby crying]

translation.en: -Fuck! -[car door slamming]

translation.en: The Barkley brief went out yesterday, along with your summation of Monday's mediation.
translation.it: La nota di Barkley è uscita ieri, e pure la mediazione di lunedì.

translation.en: [whispering] Seriously? On the family computer?

translation.en: Don't say my name, you only say my name when you--

translation.en: No, not a problem.

translation.en: Email me your notes and I'll get it out to you this afternoon.

translation.en: You were saying?

translation.en: All men do it.

translation.en: Do men almost go bankrupt because of money they spent?

translation.en: That was five years ago.

translation.en: Not a problem.
translation.it: Ma figurati!

translation.en: Yeah, okay. You, too. Okay.

translation.en: What do you want me to say, Devin? They're just sneakers.

translation.en: I averaged 22 points, and I wore them to prom. Plus, most importantly, I--

translation.en: [Devin] Is this what it's come down to? Dropping our son off at the sitter's,

translation.en: just so you can buy a pair of tennis shoes?

translation.en: Marriage got you soft.

translation.en: They're just sneakers.

translation.en: Now, bang this left, and let's get shit poppin'.

translation.en: Yeah. Get it poppin'.

translation.en: Line's around the corner, dog. On a Thursday?
translation.it: - La fila inizia dietro l'angolo. - Di giovedì?

translation.en: It's a Hyperstrike, so…
translation.it: Sono le Hyperstrike…

translation.en: Say what?
translation.it: Le che?

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.it: Ma fate sul serio?

translation.en: I'd chop off both my thumbs for this pair of sneakers.

translation.en: How much are they? -I don't know. -If you're not with IVs,
translation.it: - Quanto costano? - Non lo so.

translation.en: -the fuck you doing? -Reselling.
translation.it: - Non ami le IV… che fai qui? - Sono un reseller.

translation.en: So, is this line always this long?

translation.en: Came across an unclaimed piece of meat in Baja. Turned out to be Rosie.
translation.it: "Ho trovato un pezzo di carne a Baja. Era Rosie.

translation.it: E il tuo passaporto a Sumatra. Alle Fiji ci siamo mancati."

translation.en: But I knew you wouldn't miss the White Cem-- Oh!

translation.en: -What the fuck are those? -They're for a good cause.
translation.it: - Che cazzo sono? - È per beneficenza.

translation.en: For every pair I buy, a poor kid gets a pair.

translation.en: Okay, unless that poor kid can eat them shits to nourish his body,
translation.it: Ok, a meno che quella merda non si possa mangiare, sono inutili. Te lo dico io.

translation.en: it's worthless. I'm gonna tell you that. Don't disrespect the shoe game.
translation.it: Ok, a meno che quella merda non si possa mangiare, sono inutili. Te lo dico io. Non insultare la passione.

translation.en: Embarrassing. I can't be talking to someone this far in line. We gotta go.
translation.it: È vergognoso. Dai, non posso parlare con l'ultimo della fila.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Scanning. Don't worry.
translation.it: - Ma che fai? - Controllo, amico. Tranquillo. Ehi, seriamente, perché abbiamo smesso?

translation.en: Hey, man, real talk. Why we stop kicking it?
translation.it: Tranquillo. Ehi, seriamente, perché abbiamo smesso?

translation.en: Are you gonna act like you don't know?
translation.it: Fai davvero finta di non saperlo?

translation.en: What's up? Good to see you.
translation.it: Mike, bello rivederti.

translation.en: How am I supposed to know why you won't return my calls when you would never return my calls?

translation.en: Let's not do this right now. How's Foot Locker?
translation.it: Non ora, dai. Da Foot Locker come va?

translation.en: Forget Foot Locker.
translation.it: Non ci sto più.

translation.en: Then what's up with the gear?
translation.it: E la maglietta?

translation.en: Figured I had it, I might ref a kids' league while I went back to school.
translation.it: Mi è rimasta, pensavo di arbitrare i ragazzini mentre studio, semplice.

translation.en: -No big deal. -You back in school?
translation.it: Mi è rimasta, pensavo di arbitrare i ragazzini mentre studio, semplice. Sei tornato a scuola?

translation.en: -Look at me, thinking you haven't changed! -[laughing]
translation.it: E io che pensavo non fossi cambiato!

translation.en: Okay, you trying to get the degree. What school?
translation.it: Ok, vuoi laurearti. Che facoltà è?

translation.en: Some night classes there on Melrose.
translation.it: Sono dei corsi serali a Melrose.

translation.en: Hey, buy your mama something nice? All right.
translation.it: Compra qualcosa di carino a tua madre.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, Bobby. Since when is there a college on Melrose?
translation.it: Ehi, Bobby, da quando c'è un college sulla Melrose?

translation.en: All right, guys, as obvious as it sounds, you can't master reconstruction without deconstruction.
translation.it: Gente, per quanto possa sembrare ovvio, non c'è ricostruzione senza distruzione.

translation.en: -What about material? -Corduroy's the next elephant print.
translation.it: - E il materiale? - Il velluto pare pelle d'elefante.

translation.en: Corduroy is 100% not the next elephant print.

translation.en: -Shoe school? -Some 11s in the same colorway as a bowling shoe.

translation.it: - No. - Tiger Woods le comprerebbe.

translation.it: - No. - Scuola di calzature?

translation.it: - Serena Williams. - No.

translation.it: - Venus? - No.

translation.en: Dom, he's killing it right now.

translation.en: -Megan Fox? -Anyone? Anybody else?
translation.it: - Megan Fox? - Qualcun altro?

translation.en: He makes customs for Bieber, OBJ, LBJ, all kinds of celebs.
translation.it: Fa modelli per Bieber, Odell, LeBron, tante celebrità.

translation.en: If I want to be the best, I got to learn from the best.
translation.it: E io voglio imparare dal migliore, no?

translation.en: -That's what I'm doing. -All right. What's a Hyperstrike?
translation.it: - Ed è quel che farò. - Ok, cosa sono le Hyperstrike?

translation.en: Hype--? See what going ghost for 5 years does to you?

translation.en: You lose your edge, all right? But, lucky for you,

translation.en: previous transgressions have been forgiven.
translation.it: Ma sei fortunato, ti perdono i vecchi peccati.
Ok, abbiamo un 44, poi 43, 42, 46 e due 47.
Un 46, 39, io ho le 44, un 47.

translation.en: You good, you straight.

translation.en: You can tell someone's size just by looking at their feet?

translation.en: Dope, right? I had a one-night stand with this psychic and she got my chakras
translation.it: Sì, una sensitiva mi ha sistemato i chakra… Non funziona così.

translation.en: -in order. -That's not…
translation.it: Non funziona così.

translation.en: -No, no. -Hold up. Stay.
translation.it: - No. - Fermo qui.

translation.en: What the fuck? You got them, right?
translation.it: Ma che cazzo? Ce l'hai, no?

translation.en: Hey. What's up? It's me, Bobby P, AKA Bobby The Butcher, AKA Bobby Williams—
translation.it: Ehi. Come va? Sono Bobby P, alias Bobby il macellaio o Bobby Williams…

translation.en: AKA random old dude that thinks I give a shit who he is. Dope shirt.

translation.en: Oh, this? Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.it: Questa? Grazie. Lo apprezzo.

translation.en: I'm fucking with you. It's hideous.
translation.it: Scherzavo, è orrenda.

translation.en: Are you still running for StevieKickz?

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.it: - Dai, prendi tutte le 44? - Sono Nori.

translation.en: -You're gonna swipe the tens? -This is Nori. Talk to me.

translation.en: -At least-- -Tell him you want both pairs
translation.it: - Ma… - Digli che le vuoi entrambe

translation.en: for the price he agreed to, or you're bouncing.
translation.it: a quel prezzo, o le lasci.

translation.en: -Ask for Inny. -I want to see them.

translation.en: Then buy them retail.

translation.it: - Allora? - Tutto a posto.

translation.en: Yo, my man!
translation.it: Ehi, tu!

translation.en: Line's here for a reason.

translation.en: Like I give a shit about a pair of remastered IVs. Real ballers have the OG.

translation.en: -All here, man. -Appreciate it.
translation.it: - Tieni, amico. - Ok, grazie.

translation.en: Beach day in the 'Bu. Guess you didn't get the invite.

translation.en: Oxnard is the new Malibu, fool! You'd know if you weren't such a hypebeast!

translation.en: I hope you randomly get hit by a bus!
translation.it: Spero ti investa un bus!

translation.en: Yes. Feels like old times, doesn't it?
translation.it: Sì. È come ai vecchi tempi, vero?

translation.en: Yeah, man.
translation.it: Già.

translation.en: -They got Is over there. -[gasps] -IIIs over there, VIs. -[laughs]
translation.it: Laggiù ci sono le "I", lì le "III", lì le "VI".

translation.en: Ooh. You remember these? First pair I ever flipped.
translation.it: Oh, te le ricordi? Le prime che ho rivenduto.

translation.en: That's so crazy.
translation.it: È pazzesco.

translation.en: I know. Let's get you laced up.

translation.en: Oh, man, it's been a long time.
translation.it: Diamine, quanto tempo è passato.

translation.en: Oh, those are fire right there. Whoo!
translation.it: Oh, quelle sono favolose.

translation.en: Wow.
translation.it: Accidenti.

translation.en: Who would have thought it? Devin Clemons, back from the dead.
translation.it: Chi l'avrebbe mai detto? Devin Clemons è resuscitato.

translation.en: "Gia"? Is that really the best you can do? Oh, my God. Come here. Get over here.
translation.it: "Gia"? È tutto quel che sai dire? Oddio, vieni qua.

translation.en: Catch me up. How you been?
translation.it: Aggiornami. Come stai?

translation.en: I've been good. I've been busy. Like, really, super-super busy.
translation.it: Bene. Sono stato impegnato. Tipo, super impegnato.

translation.en: -Super busy? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Super impegnato. - Già.

translation.en: Oh, right. Well… good for you, Dev. Good for you.
translation.it: Giusto. Beh, buon per te, Dev.

translation.en: Hey, get me a size 13.
translation.it: Ehi, portami una 47.

translation.en: You remember that.
translation.it: Te lo ricordi.

translation.en: You'd be surprised at how much I remember.
translation.it: Non hai idea di quante cose ricordi.

translation.en: -The last ones. -Thank you.
translation.it: - L'ultimo paio. - Grazie.

translation.en: -Last pair in your size. How about that? -Thank you.
translation.it: - L'ultimo paio della tua misura. - Grazie.

translation.en: -All right. -[Gia laughs]
translation.it: Ottimo.

translation.en: What the…?
translation.it: Ma che…?

translation.en: It's Cole, I fucking guarantee it.
translation.it: È Cole, te lo garantisco.

translation.en: Hold up.
translation.it: Aspetta.

translation.en: -Look. -White Cement IVs.
translation.it: - Guarda. - White Cement IV.

translation.en: -You know how we do. I wait in no lines. -Daniel?
translation.it: - Io non faccio file. - Daniel? Prendi la tua roba e vattene.

translation.en: -Get your shit and get out! -Fuck.
translation.it: - Io non faccio file. - Daniel? Prendi la tua roba e vattene. Cazzo.

translation.en: I'm so sorry about that. Here.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto. Dammi.

translation.en: -You know how long we waited outside? -Look.
translation.it: - Sai quanto abbiamo aspettato? - Sentite…

translation.en: If there's anything I can do to make it up to you, let me know, okay?
translation.it: Se c'è qualcosa che posso far per te, fammelo sapere.

translation.en: It's… It's all good.
translation.it: Va… tutto bene.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: You look good, by the way.
translation.it: Sei in gran forma.

translation.en: He know.
translation.it: Lo sa.

translation.en: You look good… You look good as well.
translation.it: Stai bene anche tu.

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.it: Zitto.

translation.en: Hey, man, this is great.
translation.it: Cavolo, è incredibile.

translation.en: Think about it. Even if it didn't work out there, you, me, the thrill of the game.
translation.it: Pensaci. Anche se non ha funzionato… Io, te, il brivido del gioco.

translation.en: -What we got next? -Good seeing you, Bobby.
translation.it: - Ok, e ora? - Bello averti rivisto.

translation.en: You really about to blow me off? I got something that could be huge.
translation.it: Te ne vai così? Avrei qualcosa per noi.

translation.en: -There is no us. -And why not?
translation.it: - Non c'è un "noi". - Perché?

translation.en: I have a family now.
translation.it: Ora ho una famiglia.

translation.en: Which I clearly warned you about when you met what's-her-name.
translation.it: Io ti avevo avvertito, quando hai conosciuto "cosa".

translation.en: Christine. Her name is Christine.
translation.it: Christine. Si chiama Christine.

translation.en: Does Christine wear the pantalones in tu casa or do you? No. I wear the pantalones in mi casa.
translation.it: - E i pantaloni li porta lei, a casa? - No, li porto io, a casa mia.

translation.en: You also wear dad clothes and Toms, too. You look horrible.
translation.it: Ma con dei vestiti e delle scarpe orribili, però.

translation.en: Let's do this. I got a hook-up at the Foot Locker I got fired from.
translation.it: Dai, ho una dritta dal Foot Locker che mi ha licenziato.

translation.en: -Good seeing you, Bobby. -Bullshit! Great seeing me.
translation.it: - Bello rivederti, Bobby. - Bello? Grande!

translation.en: I know you didn't come for the IVs.
translation.it: Non sei venuto solo per le IV.

translation.en: -You came to get your old self back. -My old self was an irresponsible asshole.
translation.it: - Volevi riassaggiare la tua vecchia vita. - Quand'ero uno stronzo.

translation.en: Who was the flyest motherfucker in every spot we rolled up in. Now look at you.
translation.it: Sì, ma lo stronzo più fico dovunque andassimo. Ora guardati.

translation.en: You gonna let your wife dress you like a bum? Is that what you gonna do?
translation.it: Ti farai vestire così per sempre? Vuoi questo?

translation.en: -I know what you're doing. -What?
translation.it: - So cosa stai facendo. - Cosa?

translation.en: It's not gonna work. Not now, not ever, Bobby.
translation.it: Ma non funzionerà. Né ora, né mai, Bobby.

translation.en: Then why did you come to this line, huh?
translation.it: E allora perché sei venuto fin qui, eh?

translation.en: You could've went to any spot to get your fix, but you came here.
translation.it: Di tutta la città, hai scelto proprio questo posto.

translation.en: Want to know why?
translation.it: Sai perché?

translation.en: You don't know who you are anymore, no clue.
translation.it: Perché non sai più chi sei.

translation.en: It's called early onset midlife crisis.
translation.it: Si chiama "crisi di mezza età precoce".

translation.en: That's the bad news. The good news? I know how to fix it.
translation.it: Purtroppo. Ma io ho la soluzione.

translation.en: So, the Lakers traded Jason Hoodak two nights ago, right?
translation.it: I Lakers hanno ceduto Jason Hoodak, no?

translation.en: Right?
translation.it: Giusto?

translation.en: A girl I went to junior high with's sister's dating a dude
translation.it: La sorella di una del mio liceo esce col cugino

translation.en: who's cousins with the head ball boy's girlfriend, and she said that Hoodak, despite his horrible jump shot,
translation.it: della ragazza del raccattapalle, e dice Hoodak, per quanto pessimo sia,

translation.en: is a huge sneaker freak.
translation.it: va pazzo per le sneakers.

translation.en: In addition, I have it under good authority
translation.it: Inoltre, fonti certe mi dicono

translation.en: that dude don't keep up to date with one of his storage units.
translation.it: che il tipo non ha pagato l'affitto di un piccolo deposito.

translation.en: In fact, said storage unit is up for auction today,
translation.it: Infatti, il contenuto di quel deposito andrà all'asta oggi

translation.en: and I'm the only one who knows about it, brother.
translation.it: e sono l'unico a saperlo, fratello.

translation.en: You 100% sure no one else knows about it?
translation.it: Solo tu? Sei sicuro al 100%?

translation.en: A thousand percent sure. A thousand.
translation.it: Al mille per cento. Mille.

translation.en: -Get in. -Yes!
translation.it: - Sali. - Sì!

translation.en: Okay, let's do this.
translation.it: Ok, forza.

translation.en: Remember that one time you found those Diamond SBs on Craigslist for two bills?
translation.it: Ricordi quando trovasti quelle Diamond SB su Craiglist per 200 $?

translation.en: We hopped the train to La Jolla, got fucked up on that pier
translation.it: E andammo a La Jolla a sballarci sul molo

translation.en: -after you copped them. Remember? -[laughs] Of course.
translation.it: - dopo averle coppate? - Sì, certo.

translation.en: Yeah, that was awesome.
translation.it: È stato fantastico.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Don't this feel like old times?
translation.it: Non è come ai vecchi tempi?

translation.en: If feels like after all this time we just, boom, picked it right back up where we left off.
translation.it: Dopo tutto questo tempo, riprendiamo da dove avevamo lasciato.

translation.en: -You're the only one who knows? -Before you say something you'll regret,
translation.it: Lo sapevi solo tu? Ok, prima di sparare a zero, sappi che anch'io sono seccato.

translation.en: I'm equally as upset as you are.
translation.it: Ok, prima di sparare a zero, sappi che anch'io sono seccato.

translation.en: Think, intel was off, but it wasn't wrong. This is a bump in the road. This is--
translation.it: Ma la dritta era comunque giusta. È un piccolo imprevisto, dai.

translation.en: Yo, watch where you're going, bitch.
translation.it: Yo, guarda dove vai, stronzo.

translation.en: What? What did you just call me?
translation.it: Cos… come mi hai chiamato?

translation.en: I don't know why you're tripping, but I suggest you back off before--
translation.it: Non so perché te la prendi, ma ti suggerisco di starmi…

translation.en: Yo, I want my shoes.
translation.it: Ridammi le scarpe.

translation.en: -Excuse me? -Cement IVs, size 13. You swiped my pair.
translation.it: - Che? - Cement IV, misura 47. Me le hai fregate.

translation.en: Yeah, don't hate the player, my G, hate the game.
translation.it: Amico mio, fa parte del gioco.

translation.en: Is this corny-ass Asian dude trying to tell me about the game?
translation.it: Questo cazzone asiatico vuole insegnarmi a giocare?

translation.en: Corny-ass Asian dude who knew enough to swipe your sneakers, right?
translation.it: Un cazzone che ne sa abbastanza da fregarti le scarpe, no?

translation.en: The fuck I look like?
translation.it: Chi cazzo ti sembro?

translation.en: Besides some dude that works at Banana Republic?
translation.it: A parte uno che lavora da Banana Republic?

translation.en: I don't give a fuck. Don't waste your energy. He already flipped them.
translation.it: Me ne frego. Non perdeteci tempo, le ha già rivendute.

translation.en: Hey, that's Nori.
translation.it: Ehi, è Nori.

translation.en: She the plug. Come on, trust me on this one.
translation.it: È l'aggancio. Dai, fidati di me.

translation.en: Look, okay, how do you know?
translation.it: Senti, come lo sai?

translation.en: I know everything.
translation.it: - Io so tutto. - No, ma come sai che…

translation.en: -How you-- -[phone chimes] Hold that thought.
translation.it: - Io so tutto. - No, ma come sai che… Aspetta. Sì, ciao.

translation.en: Yeah, hey.
translation.it: Aspetta. Sì, ciao.

translation.en: Yeah. Is it the bass-- Do I not have bass in my voice?
translation.it: - Sì. - Ho… la voce troppo stridula?

translation.en: No,. You're all good on the Foamposite ParaNormans, but he's working on the Yellow Lobsters.
translation.it: No, le Foamposite ParaNormans le ho prese, sta lavorando alle Yellow Lobster.

translation.en: Let him know that I'm going to pay $10,000 for a pair of Carhartt 4s.
translation.it: Digli che pagherò 10.000 dollari per un paio di Carhartt 4.

translation.en: You and the rest of his list.
translation.it: Come tutti gli altri.

translation.en: -Fuck it… 15K, but that's it. -I'll see what I can do.
translation.it: - 'Fanculo. Ok, 15.000. - Vedrò cosa posso fare.

translation.en: -You were saying? -Yeah, I was saying,
translation.it: Dicevi? Sì, stavo dicendo… Come sapevi dell'asta?

translation.en: how did you know about this auction?.
translation.it: Sì, stavo dicendo… Come sapevi dell'asta?

translation.en: Please. I've been working the auction circuit for years.
translation.it: Ti prego. Seguo le aste da anni.

translation.en: But you're a kid.
translation.it: Ma sei una bambina.

translation.en: And you're an old man in a pair of espadrilles.
translation.it: E tu sei un vecchio con le espadrilles.

translation.en: These are not espadrilles. These are Toms and they're for a good cause.
translation.it: Non sono espadrilles. Sono di Toms, per una buona causa.

translation.en: Haven't those kids suffered enough?
translation.it: Risparmia quei poveri.

translation.en: You know what? Fuck you. Most importantly, fuck you, Bobby.
translation.it: Sai che c'è? Vaffanculo. E vaffanculo a te, Bobby.

translation.en: Wait, I didn't even…
translation.it: Fermo, io non…

translation.en: You can deny it all you want, I know you feel it, okay? There's IVs in there, original IVs.
translation.it: Non negarlo, so cosa provi, ok? Ci sono delle IV originali, lì dentro.

translation.en: Not just IVs, PEs, 101s, Friends and Familys, they all in there.
translation.it: E anche delle PE, le 101, roba per amici e parenti.

translation.en: I know for a fact they in there, okay?
translation.it: So per certo che sono lì dentro, ok?

translation.en: And we just got to believe on this one. Trust me on this.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo crederci. Fidati di me.

translation.en: Hoodak, did I mention he a size 13?
translation.it: Hoodak, ti ho detto che porta il 47?

translation.en: You a size 13. Don't believe me, Google that shit.
translation.it: Come te. Se non mi credi, cerca su Google.

translation.en: I will.
translation.it: Lo farò.

translation.en: -Hoodak: H-O-O-D-A-K-- -I know how to spell. What was it again?
translation.it: - Hoodak. H-O-O-D-A-K. - So come si scrive. Com'è?

translation.en: -H-O-O-D-A-K. -Okay. You got to hurry up. They're starting the auction.
translation.it: - H-O-O-D-A-K. Muoviti, l'asta è tra poco. - Ok.

translation.en: Everyone gets 3 minutes to view from this side of the line.
translation.it: Avete tre minuti ognuno per dare un'occhiata.

translation.en: Don't go inside, don't touch any items. That's the rules.
translation.it: Non si entra, non si tocca nulla. Sono le regole.

translation.en: Yes. And no use of night-vision goggles, scopes, or infrared cameras of any kind.
translation.it: Sì, e niente visori o telecamere all'infrarosso, né mirini.

translation.en: Good to know.
translation.it: Buono a sapersi.

translation.en: I'm Stuey, by the way.
translation.it: Io sono Stuey, comunque.

translation.en: Made my name in comics and collectibles before transitioning to the shoe game.
translation.it: Prima delle scarpe, trafficavo in fumetti e roba da collezione.

translation.en: We should hang out after this, right?
translation.it: Dopo usciamo insieme?

translation.en: My treat, of course.
translation.it: Offro io, ovviamente.

translation.en: We should go to an escape room. Puzzles are my jam.
translation.it: Una escape room? Adoro i puzzle.

translation.en: All right. Back up.
translation.it: Va bene. State indietro.

translation.en: All right, we're gonna start this bidding on 8104.
translation.it: Iniziamo l'asta per il lotto 8104.

translation.en: One thousand to the always-pleasant lady in a hoodie.
translation.it: Mille dalla bella signora con la felpa.

translation.en: -Eleven hundo. -$1,100 over here.
translation.it: - Mille e 100. - Mille e 100 lì.

translation.en: I got this. $1,101.
translation.it: Ci penso io. Mille e 101.
Mille e 500.

translation.en: -So we're just skipping there? -$1,525.
translation.it: Quindi passiamo? Mille e 750.

translation.en: -$1,805. -$1,805. What we got next? What?
translation.it: - Mille e 850. - Mille e 850, chi offre di più?

translation.en: -$2,000. -Twenty-five hundo.
translation.it: - Duemila. - Duemila e 100.
Duemila 501.
- Tremila. - Tremila.

translation.en: They're kids. How did they get this money?
translation.it: Dove prendono i soldi?

translation.en: -Four geezys. -Four geezys.
translation.it: - Quattromila. - Quattromila.

translation.en: You got to. Have to. We here. We came this far.
translation.it: Devi farlo, siamo venuti apposta fin qua, ok?

translation.en: Look, she out. This is it.
translation.it: Lei abbandona. Ci siamo.

translation.en: Hey, looks like I win again, losers.
translation.it: Ehi, vincerò di nuovo, sfigati.

translation.en: You gonna let it happen? We came this far.
translation.it: Glielo permetti? Siamo venuti fin qua.

translation.en: Fifty-fifty split?
translation.it: A metà?

translation.en: [Auctioneer] Four geezys going twice on 8104.
translation.it: Quattromila e due, per il lotto 8104.

translation.en: Fuck it. Five stacks.
translation.it: 'Fanculo. Cinquemila.

translation.en: Yes! Go big or go home, baby!
translation.it: Sì! Tutto o niente, amico!

translation.en: -Five stacks. -Deuces, yo.
translation.it: - Cinquemila. - Tienitelo.

translation.en: -Takes money to make money. -Know what I'm saying? Five stacks!
translation.it: - Ehi, i soldi portano soldi. - Mi spiego? Cinquemila!

translation.en: -Five stacks, baby! -[laughs]
translation.it: Cinquemila, piccolo!

translation.en: What the fuck do you mean you don't have actual money?
translation.it: Che cazzo vuoi dire con "non ho i soldi"?

translation.en: Relax, okay? I put all my money into shoe school. I'm investing in myself.
translation.it: Calma, ho pagato la scuola di calzature. Investo su me stesso.

translation.en: No. You said we were going 50/50 on this.
translation.it: Ma avevi detto 50 e 50.

translation.en: Your 50's 100% of the required capital.
translation.it: Il tuo 50 è il 100% del capitale.

translation.en: My 50 percent is what we in the know refer to as "sweat equity."
translation.it: Il mio 50% è quel che si chiama "capitale del sudore".

translation.en: Swequity.
translation.it: Il "capidore".

translation.en: Swequity, cool. I'm gonna write that down.
translation.it: "Capidore" è forte, lo devo scrivere.

translation.en: Fuck your damn swequity!
translation.it: 'Fanculo il capidore!

translation.en: Do you think I got five large laying around? Do you think that?
translation.it: Credi che abbia 5.000 $ a disposizione?

translation.en: You got a house in LA. I refuse to believe you're not doing okay.
translation.it: Hai una casa a Los Angeles, no? Devi star bene.

translation.en: Christine's parents left us that house when they moved to Encinitas.
translation.it: È dei miei suoceri, si sono trasferiti a Encinitas.

translation.en: I'm not about to risk my family's vacation money,
translation.it: Non rischierò i soldi delle vacanze di famiglia,

translation.en: let alone my marriage, for no dumbass storage unit.
translation.it: né il mio matrimonio, per un cesso di deposito.

translation.en: It ain't no dumbass! -Dumbass storage! -[clears throat]
translation.it: - Non è un cesso! - È un cesso di deposito!

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is a great… Right?
translation.it: Mi scusi. È un bel… no?

translation.en: -Great storage. -It's clean and everything.
translation.it: - Un bel deposito. - Pulito, e tutto.

translation.en: -I'm not about to do it. -Do the math.
translation.it: - Non lo farò. - Fai due conti.

translation.en: There's like, what? 50 boxes in here. More than 50.
translation.it: C'erano 50 scatole lì dentro. Più di 50.

translation.en: If we can sell them for retail, we'll get at least ten Gs, minimum.
translation.it: A prezzi correnti, possiamo ricavarci 10.000 dollari.

translation.en: You gonna walk away from ten G's because you scared of your wife?
translation.it: Rinunci a 10.000 $ per paura di tua moglie?

translation.en: You woke up this morning, you was nothing but a husband.
translation.it: Stamattina sei uscito da semplice marito.

translation.en: You pull this off, you'll go home a fucking hero.
translation.it: Se ce la fai, torni a casa da eroe, cazzo.

translation.en: You'll be like Anna from Frozen.
translation.it: Sarai come Anna di Frozen.

translation.en: She a hero for the kids.
translation.it: È un'eroina, per i bambini.

translation.en: Just do it.
translation.it: Fallo e basta.

translation.en: Don't do it.
translation.it: Non farlo.

translation.en: Like Anna from Frozen.
translation.it: Anna di Frozen.

translation.en: You take Discover?
translation.it: Accettate Discover?

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.it: Ci siamo.

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughing]
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: Hmm. What does that say?
translation.it: Cosa c'è scritto?

translation.en: -You kidding me? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ci credi? - Già.

translation.en: The Shattered Backboards?
translation.it: Le Shattered Backboards?

translation.en: -Shake it and read it. -Oh, yeah! All right.
translation.it: - Scuoti e leggi. - Sì! Va bene.

translation.en: Corked Lebron 10s!
translation.it: Le LeBron 10 in sughero!

translation.en: No way!
translation.it: Non ci credo!

translation.en: These are Kobe 9 HTMs.
translation.it: Le Kobe 9 HTM!

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Guess how much those are. Guess
translation.it: - Davvero? - Indovina quanto costano.

translation.en: -Four, five hundred. -Try $10,000.
translation.it: - Quattrocento, 500. - Prova 10.000.

translation.en: -Liar! Look, these are not worth ten! -Those are $10,000.
translation.it: Bugiardo! Non valgono tanto! Sì, invece, guarda sulla app GOAT.

translation.en: Look on the GOAT app.
translation.it: Sì, invece, guarda sulla app GOAT.

translation.en: Size 12 and a half.
translation.it: Sono 46.5, no?

translation.en: -$10,000 dollars! [laughs] -$10,000. Whoo!
translation.it: - Diecimila dollari! - Diecimila.

translation.en: The Grateful 3s!
translation.it: Le Grateful 3!

translation.en: Yo, that's $18,000!
translation.it: Yo, 18.000 dollari!

translation.en: -These are Air Mag boxes! -Air Mags!
translation.it: - Sono scatole Air Mag! - Air Mag!

translation.en: These are $20,000. It say $20,000?
Okay, hold up.
translation.it: Ok, aspetta.

translation.en: -Shit! -They're $20,000!
translation.it: - Merda! - Ventimila!

translation.en: No… No way. Kentucky 8s.
translation.it: Non ci credo. Le Kentucky 8.
Dice… 40.000 dollari!

translation.en: [both singsong] $40,000!
translation.it: Sì, 40.000 dollari!

translation.en: -What? -Why is there only… one of them?
translation.it: - Cosa? - Perché ce n'è solo una?

translation.en: -What? -Only one shoe in there.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Una sola scarpa.

translation.en: -They can't all be like that. -That one, too! Okay, only one.
translation.it: - Non possono essere tutte così. - Anche questa. Solo una scarpa.

translation.en: -They can't all be like… Okay. -It's only the left shoe!
translation.it: - Non è possibile… - C'è solo la sinistra!

translation.en: Check another one! -What? Oh! One Air Mag! -Wait…
translation.it: - Aprine un'altra. Una sola Air Mag! - Aspetta…

translation.en: Not all of them. Come on. No, no, no. That's…
translation.it: No, non tutte. Dai. No. È…

translation.en: -Shit! -That's…
translation.it: - Merda! - È…

translation.en: This could be $20,000. You could have $20,000.
translation.it: Potrebbero valere 20.000 dollari. Mi spiace dirvelo,

translation.en: Hate to break it to you, they're all gonna be like that.
translation.it: Mi spiace dirvelo, ma sono tutte così.

translation.en: This is for all you lying-ass man-hos leaving your pregnant girlfriends
translation.it: Questo è per tutti gli uomini falsi che lasciano le compagne incinta

translation.en: for chicken-nugget-looking side chicks.
translation.it: per delle ragazze di contorno.

translation.en: Okay. Wait. Breathe. Breathe.
translation.it: Ok. Aspetta. Respira.

translation.en: Fuck you, Bobby!
translation.it: Vaffanculo, Bobby!

translation.en: If you… think about it, this is… This right here
translation.it: Se ci pensi bene, questo è…

translation.en: is just a bump in the road. Listen to this. I used to work with a guy
translation.it: solo un inconveniente, ok? Ascoltami, lavoravo con un tizio

translation.en: who knew someone who only had one leg. His right leg.
translation.it: che conosceva uno con solo la gamba destra.

translation.en: But not the point. We can find people in similar situations.
translation.it: Ma il punto è: troviamo persone simili. Fammi spiegare.

translation.en: Let me explain. I got other ideas, too. I got this app, dope app.
translation.it: Ma il punto è: troviamo persone simili. Fammi spiegare. Ho un'idea per una app, una figata. È Tinder per gli sneakerhead.

translation.en: Like Tinder but for sneakerheads. You take a picture of your shoe.
translation.it: Ho un'idea per una app, una figata. È Tinder per gli sneakerhead. Fotografi la scarpa e se piaci a qualcuno, scatta l'abbinamento.

translation.en: If someone likes it and they swipe right, they pair up with you.
translation.it: Fotografi la scarpa e se piaci a qualcuno, scatta l'abbinamento.

translation.en: That's dope, right? Come on, admit it.
translation.it: Forte, no? Dai, ammettilo.

translation.en: Ask me what it's called.
translation.it: Chiedimi come si chiama.

translation.en: -Ask me what it's called. -No.
translation.it: - Chiedimelo. - No.

translation.en: It's called Sole Mates. That's gonna be huge.
translation.it: Si chiama "Suola Gemella". E spaccherà.

translation.en: -I'm telling you it's gonna be huge. -Move.
translation.it: - Avrà successo. - Spostati.

translation.en: But wait. Okay. Eh-- Look.
translation.it: Aspetta. Ok, senti.

translation.en: This-- This is a side hustle. The-- The app is the dream.
translation.it: Questa è stata una fregatura. La app è il vero sogno.

translation.en: The real money comes in when… when we find the Zeros.
translation.it: I soldi veri arriveranno quando troveremo le Zero.

translation.en: That's when the real money comes in. I know you can't believe this.
translation.it: È così che faremo i soldi. Ok? Lo so che non ci credi.

translation.en: [stammers] I can't code, okay? But…
translation.it: Non so programmare la app, ok? Ma…

translation.en: uh, when we find the Zeros…
translation.it: Quando troveremo le Zero…

translation.en: the most elusive shoe known to man.
translation.it: le scarpe più sfuggenti al mondo.

translation.en: The Zeros.
translation.it: Le Zero.

translation.en: Hey. Everything okay?
translation.it: Ehi. Tutto bene?

translation.en: Yeah, totally. I just was trying to hear the end of this song.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Volevo solo sentire la fine di questa canzone.

translation.en: Well, come inside.
translation.it: Dai, entra. Stiamo per iniziare Oceania.

translation.en: -Cleo and I are about to start Moana. -Okay. [fakes chuckle]
translation.it: Dai, entra. Stiamo per iniziare Oceania. Va bene.

translation.en: Hello?
translation.it: Pronto?

translation.en: Hold on. It's Discover.
translation.it: Un attimo. È Discover.

translation.en: Do you know anything about a $5,000 charge at a storage facility in West Adams?
translation.it: Sai niente di un addebito di 5.000 $ a un deposito di West Adams?

translation.en: What? That's crazy.
translation.it: Cosa? È assurdo.

translation.en: Okay, it definitely wasn't us.
translation.it: Sì, non siamo stati noi.

translation.en: So, um… So, what did they say?
translation.it: Quindi, che… hanno detto?

translation.en: They're gonna have their fraud department look into it.
translation.it: La passeranno all'Ufficio Frodi.

translation.en: Could take from 10 to 15 business days to figure out what happened.
translation.it: Ci vorranno 10-15 giorni per capire cos'è successo.

translation.en: Well, okay. Cool, cool. Um… Any-- Anything else?
translation.it: Oh, ok. Bene. Nient'altro?

translation.en: No, just that. And I love you.
translation.it: No, solo quello. E ti amo.

translation.en: I love you, too.
translation.it: Ti amo anch'io.
